channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Taiwanâ€™s Display Companies Want More Screens Inside and Outside Cars
item.description: Screens in cars are already common and display companies think there should be more. But do they help drivers or are they a hazard?

item.title: Soldier's Villages: Taiwan's Disappearing Cultural and Architectural Heritage
item.description: Military dependents' villages were once hubs of mainland Chinese culture in Taiwan, built by the hundreds of thousands of soldiers and their families who came with the Kuomintang g

item.title: Labor Groups Protest in Taipei on Behalf of Injured Workers
item.description: Injured workers and their supporters have rallied in Taipei demanding better protections for people who get injured in the workplace.

item.title: KMT Lawmakers, U.S. Secretary of State Visit China
item.description: A delegation of KMT lawmakers are visiting China with the goal of promoting peace in the Taiwan Strait. Meanwhile, U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken meets with Chinese Preside
